column4: hi so now my internet isnt working on my ubutnu. i even have the ehternet pluged in and it's not picking up the internet
if anyone can help out that would be greatly appreciated
if you run: ifconfig   does the interface have an IP?
one sec
i dont know what to look for
one will be the wired connection. you will see inet addr ,in the output with a class C address
can you giv me an example of what it would look like
wow i dont see that at all
i see HWaddr
then you can try and get dhcp with: sudo dhcp3 eth0
k one sec
dhcp3 :command not found
sorry, dhclient3
tho0: ERROR while getting iterface flags: no such device
the interface is eth0, not tho0
sorry i just typed it wrong in this chat. it was typed correctly in the command prompt
then try eth1
same error message
then run: sudo lshw -C network    websearch for the product line

if you specifythe file at command line it will open the file
